differentiators: Already built working Interview Assistant with same core functionality (Electron + React + Deepgram + OpenAI)
Proven real-time transcription architecture with sub-500ms latency
Deep understanding of streaming challenges and MERN stack adaptation
Fixed price confidence based on existing working solution
Fast delivery timeline (4 weeks) due to proven patterns
key_deliverables: Optimized real-time transcription with reduced latency
Secure recording and transcript storage (MongoDB + S3)
All bugs and performance issues resolved
GitLab CI/CD configured for staging and production
next_steps: Schedule discovery call to walk through existing Interview Assistant architecture
Review client's current codebase and bug inventory
Finalize technical approach and confirm timeline
clarifying_questions: What's your current transcription latency baseline and target?
For reports, what specific data points matter most to your users?
Are the bugs documented already, or should I expect some discovery work?
risk_mitigation: Existing working solution eliminates architectural guesswork
Proven patterns ensure faster delivery than building from scratch
Validation gates and artifact logging ensure traceability

handoff_to_protocol_02.discovery_call_preparation: Client should review existing Interview Assistant capabilities during call
